A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Just....bad. There was so much to explore coming out of The Force Awakens and its all thrown away. Luke's character arc indefensible. No character development for anyone else. No real story.  Too many flaws to list. I was squirming in my seat in the first 5 minutes and it didn't get better. Disney. You've mastered how a cohesive story works with Marvel. What went wrong? So...so disappointed.
